TopicTitle: SCP Containment Breatch: What it's based on.

Articles.Content:
Well this thread is about the S.C.P, Special Containment Procedures.

To those who never heard of SCP is or only heard of/played SCP Containment Breach.

The SCP is a imaginary Foundation that in top secret contains and conducts experiments on mystic artifacts. it can be anything from strange machines,killer toasters to indestructible super monsters.

And of course the scary monster from SCP Containment Breach

The strange machine is called SCP-941, Killer toaster SCP-426 and the supermoster name is SCP-682

other interesting monsters and stuff that are fun to read:

Scp-686

Scp-807

Scp-662

Scp-343

you can find what these 4 are here http://scp-wiki.wikidot.com but saying it here spoils the fun.

so if you find any fun Scp experiment share it in this thread

Edited August 4, 2012 by dt890
typo

Well this thread is about the S.P.C, Special Containment Procedures.

The SPC is Shark Punching Center, I think you had a typo there.

http://www.scp-wiki.net/10-30-a-m < Shark Punching Center.

wops yes :/ lol^
